author: chaucey
title: Excellent toy for babies
review:
My son was lucky enough to get a second hand one of these when he was around six months old.  He loved it.  (P)

There are six large blocks which each contain a different moving feature (rattling, popping etc).  They're positioned on a board with a background design, so the blocks look like faces or bodys and they can all be swapped into the different positions.  On the rear side is a duplo sized baseplate. (P)

My son loved playing with this, especially from around 6 to 18 months.  It was one of his favourite toys.(P)

On the negative side the blocks are a bit hard for little hands to get in and out of the slots that they sit in.  Also the baseplate is a bit wobbly as the designs on the other side are raised. (P)
